T02D3629:246b-1: krishna ya m'a ri s'a dha nam /
T02D3629:246b-3: gshin rje gshed nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3629:247a-1: gshin rje'i dgra la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3629:247a-2: gang gis brtse ba'i dbang gis dman dang mchog rnams kyang //
T02D3629:247a-3: stobs kyis gdul bya'i skye rnams drag por ston mdzad cing //
T02D3629:247a-4: phan pa sna tshogs sgrub mdzad sgyu ma'i gar gyi skur //
T02D3629:247a-5: gshin rje mthar byed de la bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3629:247a-6: dang por bsgrub bcas mchog tu bde ster stan la
T02D3629:247a-7: 'dug / bsam gtan khang pa dri bzangs kyis byugs
T02D3629:247a-8: yid mngon dga' // bsam gtan ting 'dzin yid kyis snying gar aam yig las //
T02D3629:247a-9: dmar po'i rnam par rab byung gtum po smig rgyu'i gzugs //
T02D3629:247a-10: de yi steng gnas 'od zer dang bcas kha dog mthing //
T02D3629:247a-11: h'um yig 'od zer brgya 'gyed gshin rje gshed la sogs //
T02D3629:247a-12: yang dag mchod bya yid kyis rnam 'phrul me tog spos //
T02D3629:247a-13: mar me la sogs rnam mang gis mchod gus phyag 'tshal //
T02D3629:247a-14: sngon du byas pa'i sdig rnams bshags pa la sogs bya //
T02D3629:247a-15: 'gro rnams ma lus stong nyid mngon bya de nas kyang //
T02D3629:247a-16: aom sh'u n+ya t'a la sogs sngags mchog tshig tu bya //
T02D3629:247a-17: bdag nyid rang gi ngo bo gus pas yongs bsgoms pa //
T02D3629:247a-18: aam yig dmar po las byung nyi ma la gnas mthing //
T02D3629:247a-19: h'um yig gzugs la rdo rjes mtshan pa'i dbyug pa mthing //
T02D3629:247a-20: dbyug pa la gnas h'um yig rab 'phro dra ba can //
T02D3629:247a-21: rgyal ba ma lus bskul zhing gdan drangs rab tu
T02D3629:247a-22: gzhug / de nyid blta zhing ma lus yongs bsngo
T02D3629:247a-23: phyi nas ni // bdag nyid myur du gshin rje mthar byed rnam bsgom bya //
T02D3629:247a-24: sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro bcas pa //
T02D3629:247a-25: phyag g-yas na ni rdo rje mtshan pa'i dbyug mthing bsnams //
T02D3629:247a-26: phyag g-yon thugs kar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang bcas pa //
T02D3629:247a-27: zhal gyi padma smin ma sma ra dmar ser 'bar //
T02D3629:247a-28: stag gi pags pa'i na bza' gsad phyogs yang dag ldan //
T02D3629:247a-29: zhal nas ljags ni ltos 'gro bzhin du rnam par bskyod//
T02D3629:247a-30: sna tshogs chu skyes 'dab bcas steng du nyi ma la //
T02D3629:247a-31: yang dag bzhugs shing drag po ma he la zhon sgrogs //
T02D3629:247a-32: zhal ni mche gtsigs mi'u thung lto ba rab tu 'phyang //
T02D3629:247a-33: spyan ni gnyis pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa //
T02D3629:247a-34: klu brgyad khros pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan cing thod pa yi //
T02D3629:247b-0: phreng ba dkar po mnyam @247b gshibs bcings sheng zhal 'phro ba //
T02D3629:247b-1: mi mgo rlon pa'i do shal mgul du rab bcings shing //
T02D3629:247b-2: aashta ha yi gad rgyangs bdung kyi dpung las rgyal //
T02D3629:247b-3: phyi nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar nyi ma la //
T02D3629:247b-4: rab zhugs h'um yig dang ldan dbyug pa sngon po bsam //
T02D3629:247b-5: der gnas h'um yig 'od kyis khams gsum snang byas shing //
T02D3629:247b-6: der zhugs yun mi ring bar slar yang nang du bya //
T02D3629:247b-7: rim pa 'dis ni spro bsdu ji ltar 'dod par bya //
T02D3629:247b-8: slar yang dam tshig sngon ma bzhin du kun byas te //
T02D3629:247b-9: thun mtshams bzhi ru 'di ni ma lus bsgom bya zhing ;
T02D3629:247b-10: / ngal bar gyur na ji bzhin bsgrubs la sngags bzlas bya //
T02D3629:247b-11: bcom ldan gshin rje mthar byed sgrub thabs bsdus byas pa'i //
T02D3629:247b-12: byams pa dpal bdag dpag med bsod nams gang 'di yis //
T02D3629:247b-13: 'gro ba ma lus bcom ldan gshin rje mthar byed gyur //
T02D3629:247b-14: bdag kyang myur du 'dir ni gshin rje mthar byed shog / de la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'o //
T02D3629:247b-15: aom hr'i:shtr'i: bi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
